Description:
Detects LDP failures which may be indicative of brute force attacks to manipulate MPLS labels

Author: Tim Brown
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Cisco LDP Authentication Failures
Query: sourcetype='cisco-ldp' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%ldp%' and (log like '%socket_tcp_packet_md5_authen_fail%' or log like '%tcpmd5authenfail%'))
